{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto operator[]( difference_type pos ) const
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}

Returns an element at specified relative location.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|n_}} be the underlying data members. Equivalent to: {{c|return views::counted(current_ + pos, n_);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pos|position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The element (of type {{rlpi|/#Member types|value_type}}) at displacement {{c|pos}} relative to the current location.
